info.introText:
An ∆ôyan∆ôyasa Pecky daga tarin ChickenWings NFT.
Pecky alama ce ta al'umma ta gaske ba tare da ku…óin ∆ôungiya ba. Ri∆ôe Peckys naka da ∆ôarfi, saboda muna ∆ôona duk abin da za mu iya samun fuka-fukanmu a kai!

staking.title: AJIYA
staking.description:
Ajiye $SUPRA naka akan Meridian node kuma sami lada na node 8% iri …óaya kamar ko'ina,
amma kana kuma samun adadin $Pecky iri …óaya da $SUPRA naka na kullum!
Fiye da kyau: 50% na lada node ana amfani da su don siya kuma ∆ôona $Pecky ga al'umma!

nfts.title: NFTs
nfts.description:
Dukkan NFTs da aka sayar akan kasuwar Crystara suna da royalty 5%.
Maimakon ri∆ôe wa…óannan ku…ói, muna amfani da kowane ko…ói don siya da ∆ôona Pecky!

peckybot.title: PECKYBOT
peckybot.description:
Akan Discord, bot namu yana taimaka wa 'yan kasuwar NFT ta aika fa…óakarwa nan take lokacin da:
‚Ä¢ wani ya yi tayi akan NFT naka
‚Ä¢ an jera babban tarin NFT ∆ôasa da farashin da ka saita
Duk Pecky da aka yi amfani da shi a matsayin gas ga bot ana aika shi nan take zuwa tarin ∆ôonewa!
